import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update models to match category issues"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/for/models/bulk/match/category"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bulk aligns model issue lists with their category defaults. Use this after updating category-level issues so all referenced models inherit the latest configuration without updating each model individually.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ModelIds** - Gather model IDs from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).
2. (Optional) Review category issues with [GET /api/v1.0/issues/for/model-categories/\{categoryId\}](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-model-category).

**Workflow Example**
1. Collect the model IDs that should mirror their category configuration.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/bulk/match/category](/docs/api/model-issues/bulk-update-model-issues-to-match-category) with a `UuidList` of those IDs.
3. Re-check a model using [GET /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/\{modelId\}](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-model) to confirm alignment.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ModelIds (request body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"title":"UuidList"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
